header.title: Topic Preview for Top Stats
header.description:
Gives the Topic Preview effect to the Top Stats MOD
* All changes will be made to Top Stats MOD files. Please back up your original files before modifying them.
header.author-notes: Requirements: You must already have installed "Top Stats MOD v1.0.10" and "Topic Preview 2.0.2" on your forum.

edit.find: $sql = 'SELECT t.forum_id, t.topic_id, t.topic_title, t.topic_time, t.topic_views, t.topic_poster, t.topic_replies, t.topic_first_poster_name, t.topic_first_poster_colour, t.topic_last_post_id, t.topic_last_poster_name, t.topic_last_poster_colour, t.topic_last_post_time, t.topic_last_view_time, t.topic_last_poster_id, f.forum_name, f.forum_image
LEFT JOIN ' . FORUMS_TABLE . ' f ON (t.forum_id = f.forum_id)

edit.action: $sql = 'SELECT t.topic_id, t.forum_id, t.topic_title, t.topic_views, t.topic_time, t.topic_first_poster_name, t.topic_first_poster_colour, t.topic_poster, t.topic_last_poster_id, t.topic_first_post_id, t.topic_last_post_id' . $topic_preview->tp_sql_select . ' FROM ' . TOPICS_TABLE . ' t ' . $topic_preview->tp_sql_join . ' WHERE ' . $db->sql_in_set('t.forum_id', $flist) . ' ORDER BY t.topic_views DESC';
